name: Spy Network
storyline: An ideology is torn by civil war. Beyond its borders, new revolutions rise. Grid on your weapon, down your equipment, summon your followers and ride forth to win glory on the revolution fields of Soviet. The soviets maintain their stranglehold on the world. Do whatever it takes to last another night. Build, explore, survive and conquer. Your enemies today can be your allies tomorrow. Attract all units and become the ruler of the region. rule the world from the new front you set up in your bunker. Money has no value in this world. blood and ideas determine the value of everything.
summary: An ideology is torn by civil war. Beyond its borders, new revolutions rise. Grid on your weapon, down your equipment, summon your followers and ride forth to win glory on the revolution fields of Soviet. The soviets maintain their stranglehold on the world.
